name: Blip A Deal
tag_list: daily-deal, daily-discount, daily-sale, best-deal, best-discount, top-discount, cheap-deal, top-deal, cheap-discount, daily-deals, deal-of-the-day, deal-tracker, group-buying, deals, deal-finder, deal-monitor, deal-sites, daily-deal-sites, local-deals, 1-
overview:
A summary of all the best daily deals and group buying deals on a single site for FREE. Find 10,000+ deals from multiple countries worldwide!

Can’t get enough of daily deals? Do you use Groupon, Living Social, KGB Deals, Tippr, Home Run, Scout Mob or any other deal site? Want to view all the deals in the one place? Visit Blip A Deal.

Blip A Deal is a comprehensive site for daily deals with +10,000 deals. Blip A Deal lists deals from all the major vendors and delivers them directly to you through our website, through our mobile applications or straight to your inbox.

Visit us @ http://blipadeal.com

OR

download

Iphone app @ http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/blipadeal/id440969951?mt=8&ls=1#

Android app @ https://market.android.com/details?id=com.blipadeal.mobile&hl=en
